abstract: Mozilla and Google said Monday that they plan to provide browser features that will allow users to opt-out of being tracked by third-party advertisers online.
snippet: Mozilla and Google said Monday that they plan to provide browser features that will allow users to opt-out of being tracked by third-party advertisers online.
lead_paragraph: Add two more Internet browser makers to the list of companies planning to offer Web users new ways to control how their personal data is collected online.

headline.main: Google and Mozilla Announce New Privacy Features

abstract: Sappi, a leading paper concern, is sponsoring a series of webisodes that promote Flo, the company’s economy line of paper. Printers and press operators are the target audience.
snippet: Sappi, a leading paper concern, is sponsoring a series of webisodes that promote Flo, the company’s economy line of paper. Printers and press operators are the target audience.
lead_paragraph: In the brave new world of media — or the brave world of new media — turnabout is most definitely fair play. Google, for instance, advertises itself in newspapers and trade publications. And now a leading paper company is promoting one of its products with a series of online video clips.

headline.main: Paper Company Wants Printers to Go the ‘Flo’ Way
headline.print_headline: Paper Company Wants Printers to Go the ‘Flo’ Way
